Translations.Text: Whoever obeys posol obeying GOD Mat rad for those turn my nie send ona ich guardian
They zavazok obedience they lavy ona some z them harbor zamer contrary do co they say GOD ZAPISNICA ICH innermost ZAMER. Ona disregard them put tvoj trust GOD GOD suffices ZASTANCA
Why they nie study Quran carefully If je z inak than GOD they zalozit it numerous contradictions

When rumor affects zaruka pojdem ich way they spread it Had they referred it posol those v zverenec them those chapat these zalezitost informovat them! If it je for GOD's grace ona Jeho zlutovanie ona nasledovat devil a few
Ona boj zapricinit GOD ona bol zodpovedny len tvoj own soul exhort believers robi the same GOD will neutralize power Z those disbelieve! GOD bol vela MOCNY vela effective
Whoever mediates dobry cin receives share credit thereof whoever mediates zly robota incurs share thereof! GOD controls all things
When greeted pozdravy ona respond lepsie pozdravy o maly equal 1! GOD reckons all things
